data.sentence: The word وَلَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to conceal, to cover, to reject, to disbelieve, to be thankless, unthankful, ungrateful, to disown, deny, faithless, black horse, dark night, tiller/farmer. [[Perhaps it should be noted that its primary meaning is to cover/conceal (hence farmer), with active/conscious intent. From this, is born: to reject/disbelieve because this is a conscious decision made by a person. Please note one can only reject something after hearing/seeing/experiencing it, not before.]]
data.sentence: The word كَفَرُوا comes from the root ك ف ر and is associated with the meanings: to conceal, to cover, to reject, to disbelieve, to be thankless, unthankful, ungrateful, to disown, deny, faithless, black horse, dark night, tiller/farmer. [[Perhaps it should be noted that its primary meaning is to cover/conceal (hence farmer), with active/conscious intent. From this, is born: to reject/disbelieve because this is a conscious decision made by a person. Please note one can only reject something after hearing/seeing/experiencing it, not before.]]

data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or
The word مِنْهُ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word يَوْمٍ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: to let run free, pasture freely, be lost. sa'atun - while, present time, distance, hour, time.
data.sentence: The word السَّاعَةُ comes from the root س و ع and is associated with the meanings: to let run free, pasture freely, be lost. sa'atun - while, present time, distance, hour, time.

data.meanings: Suddenly, unexpectedly, unawares, surprisingly or with previous causeA festival, namely EasterConfounded, perplexed or unable to see straight
data.sentence: The word بَغْتَةً comes from the root ب غ ت and is associated with the meanings: Suddenly, unexpectedly, unawares, surprisingly or with previous causeA festival, namely EasterConfounded, perplexed or unable to see straight

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word عَذَابُ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.

data.meanings: to come, to bring, come to pass, come upon, do, commit, arrive, pursue, put forth, show, increase, produce, pay, reach, happen, overtake, draw near, go, hit, meet, join, be engaged or occupied, perpetrate (e.g. crime), undertake

data.meanings: (with negatives ma, la, or lam) does not cease, to continue, still yet. to put or set apart/aside, to separate/remove/disperse.
data.sentence: The word يَزَالُ comes from the root ز ي ل and is associated with the meanings: (with negatives ma, la, or lam) does not cease, to continue, still yet. to put or set apart/aside, to separate/remove/disperse.

data.meanings: To draw forth a thing, to dispute or contend, to doubt.
data.sentence: The word مِرْيَةٍ comes from the root م ر ي and is associated with the meanings: To draw forth a thing, to dispute or contend, to doubt.

data.meanings: to be barren (womb), become dry, be unproductive, be gloomy, distressing, grievous (day), be childless, destructive.
data.sentence: The word عَقِيمٍ comes from the root ع ق م and is associated with the meanings: to be barren (womb), become dry, be unproductive, be gloomy, distressing, grievous (day), be childless, destructive.
